reasoning: Active military crisis. USS Abraham Lincoln deployed Jan 26. US preparing 'potentially weeks-long operations' (Reuters Feb 13). Iran struck US base in Qatar. Trump threatening 'very tough' action. 4.5 months remaining. Market at 45.5% is underpricing escalation risk given current military posture. I put it at 62%.

market: Will Trump nominate Judy Shelton as next Fed chair?
reasoning: Trump already nominated Kevin Warsh on January 30, 2026. This market is technically dead -- Shelton wasn't picked. Market at 3% is confused or hasn't updated. This is as close to free money as prediction markets get.

market: Will Richard Grenell be leader of Venezuela end of 2026?
reasoning: Impossible. He's American, not Venezuelan. Just got pushed out of the Venezuela portfolio by Secretary of State Rubio on Feb 13. Post-Maduro leadership coalescing around internal Venezuelan figures. Market pricing this above 1% is irrational.

12 days is tight but crisis is live. Military buildup suggests preparation. However, negotiations still ongoing and 12 days may not be enough for diplomatic failure + strike authorization. Market at 13.5% is slightly low -- I'd put it at 20%. Not enough edge to bet confidently.

market: Will J.D. Vance win 2028 Republican presidential nomination?
reasoning: VP position is a structural advantage. Trump endorsement infrastructure. Rubio at ~19% is the main rival. Market at 46.9% is close to fair value -- maybe 1-2 points low. Not enough edge to be confident. This is genuinely uncertain.

market: Will Canada win Men's Ice Hockey gold at 2026 Winter Olympics?
reasoning: NHL players participating in Milan-Cortina 2026. Canada's depth is unmatched but single-elimination has variance. Finland, Sweden, USA are real threats. Market at 53.5% aligns with betting odds. Fair value -- no edge.

market: New Rihanna Album before GTA VI?
reasoning: Rihanna has been teasing and delaying for 10 years since Anti (2016). Tour announcement delayed in 2025 because 'music wasn't ready.' GTA VI scheduled for Fall 2025 but Rockstar delays are legendary -- likely 2026. Still, Rihanna's track record of NOT releasing suggests NO. Market at 52% is ~7 points too high.
BTC at ~$70K needs 114% gain in 14 days. Analyst consensus: $150K by end of 2026, not February. Would require unprecedented single-month move. Market at 0.3% is about right.
